name: Spac3 Match
description:
Spac3 Match is a free to play virtual reality match 3 game, redesigned to use the virtual space. It's expected to be released for Oculus headsets in June 2018.  Additional platform support and regular updates to content will be added regularly.

Notes: 

This is a demo version of the game for Oculus Rift. It contains a tutorial, 5 levels and infinite mode.

An Oculus Rift and Touch controllers are required to run this game.

To Play: 

Rest your thumb on either thumbstick to create a pointer. Select buttons or aliens by pressing the index trigger.
